column1: * 1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to W.N. Beard.
* 1958 - J.R.R. Tolkien is driven at high speed to ABC Televisions studio at Aston
* 1959 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Miss Robinson.
* 1971 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Dorothy Wood (26 May 1971).
